Subject: Notification of sub task completed {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c}
Hello{!TaskScheduleGroup__c.AssignedTo__c},
All related tasks associated with Funding Opportunity({!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c}) have been completed. Please take further actions by clicking on the following link.

Sincerely,
EGMS Team
